name: Escape: Terrible House
description: You have to get out of a terrible home. In a terrible house offers ghosts, zombies, bloody corpses, bloody walls and floor. Many were in the house, but no one has yet managed to find a way out of it. Scary sounds, laughter of young children will cause a cold sweat on your body. You need to collect items to memorize numbers, use items to happen game action. You will scrap with which you can open the door to fight monsters. On the way you will meet people who need to be saved from a terrible, cursed house. Immerse yourself in the dark atmosphere of horror.
